data.name: Eng logging at Tortuga
data.desc: First export of 'braziletto' [unknown dyewood] by Eng under Capt. Anthony Hilton from Tortuga = Association Isl. to France
data.agents_nsp0: Capt Anthony Hilton, Abraham Chamberlain [missg] Neg slaves
data.note:
Logwood introduced to Tortuga until 1929, whereas brazil wood not endemic to it, and likely not introduced [given 1990s distribution of brazil wood restricted to its endemic range] /McJunkin 217, 245
 Exp to Canary Islands 1648-58? / See G. F. Steckley, *London Record Society*, vol 21 [Lon, London Record Society, 1984] Link: https://www.british-history.ac.uk/Lon-record-soc/vol21
